name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Queue for Claude - Save Time with Prompt Chains and Bulk Prompting

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Queue messages for your Claude. Achieve maximum productivity with Prompt Chains and Bulk prompting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From the creators of ChatGPT Queue,

🚀 Introducing Queue for Claude! 🚀

🤖 Ever feel like you're just waiting...and waiting...for Claude to reply? Say goodbye to downtime and hello to productivity with Queue for Claude, the Chrome extension that lets you queue up your messages in advance! Just type, hit Enter, and watch your messages line up like magic. 🎩✨

Why You'll Love Queue for Claude:

🕒 Save Time: No more waiting around. Queue your questions and keep your flow going!

🚀 Efficiency at Its Best: Multi-task like a pro. Queue for Claude works silently in the background, making every chat smoother and faster.

💬 Long Conversations, Better Answers: Great answers come from great conversations. Queue your queries for accurate, in-depth insights.

🔍 Tailored for Detailed Inquiries: Researching multiple items? Queue them individually for thorough details, avoiding missed specifics.

🌟 Endless Possibilities: From app inquiries to research, coding, writing, and more, Queue for Claude handles it all.

🎯 Easy to Use: Just load it up with Claude, start typing, and your queue will build as you press Enter. It's that simple!

🌟 Go Pro for Unlimited Power:

🚀 Upgrade to the Pro version for an unlimited queue for both Claude. Unlock endless possibilities with a one-time investment!

🛡️ 100% Cash-Back Guarantee: Not satisfied? Get your money back within the first 24 hours of purchase. No questions asked!

📢 Free ChatGPT Queue Pro license included with Queue for Claude Pro

🌟 Pro Tips:

Select an item in the queue to delete it, it'll have a red underline.
The queue will pause while you're typing, keep your text field empty to keep it rolling.
